definitions.definition: To some extent, in some degree (intermediate between very and not at all ); moderately , tolerably , fairly .
examples: The face of the Moon appearing to me to be full of indifferent high mountains.

definitions.definition: Without distinction or preference for some over others.

main_definition: ( obsolete ) To some extent, in some degree (intermediate between very and not at all ); moderately , tolerably , fairly .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) Without distinction or preference for some over others.
